meanings.definition: A person holding a title or position.
meanings.sent1: The titulars of the company were respected by all.
meanings.sent2: The new titulars of the school board were announced today.
meanings.sent3: The titulars of the chess club had to defend their titles in a tournament.
meanings.sent4: As the titulars of the kingdom, they had to make important decisions for their people.
meanings.sent5: The titulars of the debate team practiced diligently to maintain their positions.

meanings.definition: Relating to or denoting a title or titles.
meanings.sent1: The ceremony included the presentation of the titulars scrolls.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed a collection of ancient titulars documents.
meanings.sent3: The party decorations featured colorful titulars banners.
meanings.sent4: The royal family wore ornate titulars crowns for the occasion.
meanings.sent5: The book's cover had intricate titulars designs embossed on it.
